verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, called <S%G2822><s%> to be an apostle <S%G652><s%>, separated <S%G873><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>,
which <S%G3739><s%> he promised afore <S%G4279><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> scriptures <S%G1124><s%>,

concerning <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> was born <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>,

who was declared <S%G3724><s%> to be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, according <S%G2596><s%> to the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of holiness <S%G42><s%>, by <S%G1537><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%>; even Jesus Christ our Lord,

through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we received <S%G2983><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> apostleship <S%G651><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%>, for <S%G5228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>'s sake;
among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s:

To all <S%G3956><s%> that are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%>, beloved <S%G27><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints <S%G40><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

First <S%G4412><s%>, I thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is proclaimed <S%G2605><s%> throughout <S%G1722><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> witness <S%G3144><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> I serve <S%G3000><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, how <S%G5613><s%> unceasingly <S%G89><s%> I make <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, always in my prayers

making request <S%G1189><s%>, if by any means <S%G1513><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at length <S%G4218><s%> I may be prospered <S%G2137><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I long <S%G1971><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may impart <S%G3330><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> gift <S%G5486><s%>, to the end <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> may be established <S%G4741><s%>;

that <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, that I with <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> may be comforted <S%G4837><s%> in you <S%G1223><s%>, each of us by the other <S%G240><s%>'s faith <S%G4102><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> yours <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> mine <S%G1700><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G50><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> ignorant <S%G50><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> oftentimes <S%G4178><s%> I purposed <S%G4388><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> (and <S%G2532><s%> was hindered <S%G2967><s%> hitherto <S%G1204><s%>), that <S%G2443><s%> I might have <S%G2192><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> in you <S%G5213><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>.

I am <S%G1510><s%> debtor <S%G3781><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to Greeks <S%G1672><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> to Barbarians <S%G915><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> to the wise <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> to the foolish <S%G453><s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%>, as much as in <S%G2596><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> is <S%G2596><s%>, I am ready <S%G4289><s%> to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I am <S%G1870><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>: <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> to every one <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%>; to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the Greek <S%G1672><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> therein1722, 846 is <S%G601><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> a righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, But the righteous <S%G1342><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is revealed <S%G601><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> hinder <S%G2722><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>;

because <S%G1360><s%> that which is known <S%G1110><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> manifest <S%G5318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> manifested <S%G5318><s%> it unto them <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the invisible things <S%G517><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the creation <S%G2937><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> are clearly seen <S%G2529><s%>, being perceived <S%G3539><s%> through the things that are made <S%G4161><s%>, even <S%G5037><s%> his <S%G846><s%> everlasting <S%G126><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> divinity <S%G2305><s%>; that <S%G1519><s%> they <S%G846><s%> may be <S%G1511><s%> without excuse <S%G379><s%>:

because that <S%G1360><s%>, knowing <S%G1097><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, they glorified <S%G1392><s%> him not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, neither <S%G2228><s%> gave thanks <S%G2168><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> became vain <S%G3154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> reasonings <S%G1261><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> senseless <S%G801><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> was darkened <S%G4654><s%>.
Professing themselves <S%G5335><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%>, they became fools <S%G3471><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> changed <S%G236><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the incorruptible <S%G862><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> the likeness of an image <S%G1504><s%> of <S%G3667><s%> corruptible <S%G5349><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of birds <S%G4071><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> four-footed <S%G5074><s%> beasts, and <S%G2532><s%> creeping things <S%G2062><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> God2316, 2532 gave <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> uncleanness <S%G167><s%>, that their <S%G846><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> should be dishonored <S%G818><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>:

for that they <S%G3748><s%> exchanged <S%G3337><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> a lie <S%G5579><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worshipped <S%G4573><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> served <S%G3000><s%> the creature <S%G2937><s%> rather than <S%G3844><s%> the Creator <S%G2936><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> blessed <S%G2128><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> vile <S%G819><s%> passions <S%G3806><s%>: for1063, Deuteronomy37 their <S%G846><s%> women <S%G2338><s%> changed <S%G3337><s%> the natural <S%G5446><s%> use <S%G5540><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> against <S%G3844><s%> nature <S%G5449><s%>:

and <S%G5037><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the men <S%G730><s%>, leaving <S%G863><s%> the natural <S%G5446><s%> use <S%G5540><s%> of the woman <S%G2338><s%>, burned <S%G1572><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lust <S%G3715><s%> one toward another <S%G1519><s%>, <S%G240><s%> men <S%G730><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G730><s%> working <S%G2716><s%> unseemliness <S%G808><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> receiving <S%G618><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> that recompense <S%G489><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> error <S%G4106><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was due <S%G1163><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> they1381, 3756 refused <S%G1381><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their knowledge <S%G1922><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a reprobate <S%G96><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%>, to do <S%G4160><s%> those things <S%G3588><s%> which are <S%G2520><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> fitting <S%G2520><s%>;

being filled with <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>, <S%G4202><s%> wickedness <S%G4189><s%>, covetousness <S%G4124><s%>, maliciousness <S%G2549><s%>; full <S%G3324><s%> of envy <S%G5355><s%>, murder <S%G5408><s%>, strife <S%G2054><s%>, deceit <S%G1388><s%>, malignity <S%G2550><s%>; whisperers <S%G5588><s%>,

backbiters <S%G2637><s%>, hateful to God <S%G2319><s%>, insolent <S%G5197><s%>, haughty <S%G5244><s%>, boastful <S%G213><s%>, inventors <S%G2182><s%> of evil things <S%G2556><s%>, disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents <S%G1118><s%>,
without understanding <S%G801><s%>, covenant-breakers <S%G802><s%>, without natural affection <S%G794><s%>, <S%G786><s%> unmerciful <S%G415><s%>:

who <S%G3748><s%>, knowing <S%G1921><s%> the ordinance <S%G1345><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> they that <S%G3754><s%> practise <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> consent <S%G4909><s%> with them that <S%G3588><s%> practise them <S%G4238><s%>.
